Topic.Title: Have to Say It - HPQ's Woes

Message.Msg: Scott McNealy the former CEO of SunMicrosystems said he was never worried about HPQ as they are "a printer company.". Carly and Hurd had no vision. They were caretakers. Buying Compaq and Palm displays the clueless leadershipm at HPQ. The layoffs and the writeoffs are a bad sign for the floundering firm. IBM is big but mobile enough to make the necessary changes for a global economy.

Message.Title: GET OUT BEFORE OLYMPIC IS OVER!!

Topic.Title: GET OUT BEFORE OLYMPIC IS OVER!!

Message.Msg: Kind of a dumb reference. They thought the Olympics were over for hundreds of years. But both the Olympics and paternal, stubborn, gritty Grease is still around too. If you want to really scare people you'll have to try and sound intelligent. Put together something that snaps people to attention. Maybe a catchy phrase that stand up comedians try and find. Are you spreading yourself too thin? Quality is so important in every endeavor. So long.

Topic.Title: GET OUT BEFORE OLYMPIC IS OVER!!

Message.Msg: Actually he happens to be right though he doesn't know it.

Topic.Title: Pretty cool report on International Business Machines Corporation

Message.Msg: Plenty of money from Governments/Underworld coffers needing laundering can flow into US stock market, options market, etc. Profits from corruption in Afganistan need laundering, etc. Brokerages find out how to grind up retail investors on a daily basis, keeping lion's share in a reverse Robin Hood.

Topic.Title: GET OUT BEFORE OLYMPIC IS OVER!!

Message.Msg: "Actually he happens to be right though he doesn't know it." Well, it sounds like two birds of a feather, you and he. The long established IBM board file of prerogatives mandates a defines set of actions anytime confusing language blows the multi-ID alarm horn. Challenged under this rule, a skid mark DNA test is required from authors of both suspicious posts. Is this something you bargained for? Or might you reconsider flaming Watson's home board? Your other alternative is to explain why he doesn't know he's right, and then explain why he's right. So will it be the risk of exposure and reputation ruin for duplicitous acts, or an explanation? if you can sir

Topic.Title: Have to Say It - HPQ's Woes

Message.Msg: Do you really need to resort to name calling? Can you not find words to express yourself without name calling? Your discourse is quite childish, and adds nothing to the discussion about IBM and its stock performance. IBM has been consolidating since making a high of $210 in April. The stock is forming a right side of a base and looks to breat to new highs this year. I am long and strong...
